name: Cheddar Jalapeno Shrimp
author: Robyn Cochran
summary: This is a real crowd pleaser! We never have any left!  We cook these on the grill, but you can also dip them in tempura batter and deep fry them.
ingredients: 2 pounds large shrimp, peeled and deveined and butterflied
8 ounces sharp Cheddar cheese, cut into strips
1 teaspoon Old Bay Seasoning TM, or to taste
directions: Cut the jalapeno peppers into thin strips
Place a strip or two of jalapeno pepper and cheddar cheese inside each shrimp
Sprinkle the stuffed shrimp with garlic powder and   Seasoning TM
Wrap each shrimp with a slice of bacon and secure with a toothpick
Grill over medium high heat for 10 to 15 minutes, or until firm
